settings.page_subtitle: Contact your press team at the UK's oldest cheesemonger for images and more information. We love nothing better than talking about artisan cheese - press@paxtonandwhitfield.co.uk

settings.content:
For further PR information about Paxton & Whitfield, cheese press releases, high resolution images, samples and interviews with our cheese experts, please contact our marketing team.

Email: press@paxtonandwhitfield.co.uk
Phone: 01451 823460 

We also seasonally offer commission on affiliate-tracked press links via the Rakuten and Skimlinks networks. 

Talk to our press team about Artisan Cheese Tips & Advice, Cheese Valentine's Gifts, Mother's Day Cheese Gifts, Father's Day Cheese Gifts, Easter Cheese, Seasonal Cheeses, Christmas Cheese Gifts, Cheese Advent Calendars, Wedding Cheese Cakes, New & Award-Winning Cheeses, Paxton's Cheese Club, Paxton & Whitfield History and more...
